alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 11 at 4:59PM CST until November 11 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... Northeastern Newton County in southeastern Texas... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 459 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burkeville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesville, Rosepine, Anacoco, Toledo Bend Dam, Burkeville, Fort Polk, New Llano, Farrsville, Burr Ferry, Mayflower, Wiergate, Evans and Pickering. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
